mapper.select: select id, type, title, remote_addr, username, request_uri, http_method, class_method, params, session_id, response, use_time, browser, area, province, city, isp, exception, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag from my_exam_test.sys_log where id = #{id}

select id, type, title, remote_addr, username, request_uri, http_method, class_method, params, session_id, response, use_time, browser, area, province, city, isp, exception, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag from my_exam_test.sys_log limit #{offset}, #{limit}
mapper.insert: insert into my_exam_test.sys_log(type, title, remote_addr, username, request_uri, http_method, class_method, params, session_id, response, use_time, browser, area, province, city, isp, exception, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag) values (#{type}, #{title}, #{remoteAddr}, #{username}, #{requestUri}, #{httpMethod}, #{classMethod}, #{params}, #{sessionId}, #{response}, #{useTime}, #{browser}, #{area}, #{province}, #{city}, #{isp}, #{exception}, #{createBy}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag})
mapper.update:
update my_exam_test.sys_log
type = #{type},
title = #{title},
remote_addr = #{remoteAddr},
username = #{username},
request_uri = #{requestUri},
http_method = #{httpMethod},
class_method = #{classMethod},
params = #{params},
session_id = #{sessionId},
response = #{response},
use_time = #{useTime},
browser = #{browser},
area = #{area},
province = #{province},
city = #{city},
isp = #{isp},
exception = #{exception},
create_by = #{createBy},
create_date = #{createDate},
update_by = #{updateBy},
update_date = #{updateDate},
remarks = #{remarks},
del_flag = #{delFlag},
where id = #{id}
